title: Project aiming to improving players coaching

embed.title: Survey on eSports
embed.description: Electronic sports (eSports) are becoming more and more popular with a growing player base and audience. Games, that are common among eSports are for example League of Legends, Dota 2, Starcraft II or Counter Strike, but also games like for example FIFA.

body:
Hey guys,

I am currently running a project aiming to support players with their skill improvement by offering a convenient way of coaching.
It would be awesome if you could take five minutes of your time to fill out the survey attached to this post.

If you have any comments in addition to the questions in the survey feel free to comment below.

{{item:3031}}  

Best,
Tobi
